resources.string: This tab shows the list of three monuments/sites that are nearest to you.

This tab shows the list of all the important monuments and sites that you have to see at the heritage site that you are in. To see more information about a particular listed monument or a site, you can click on it
In the HOME tab, you can see the information about the heritage site that you have selected.
After you are done downloading the package, press back button and select the name of the package from the list of available packages. In the next screen you can see three tabs.
When you open the app, you see a list of packages available for you. You can access them once you download them using Download Package button and selecting the required package.

string-array.name: intro_caption
string-array.item: Realtime updates based on Site Location
Get all the information at your Fingertips
